ModMetaData.name: More Biotech Letters
ModMetaData.author: Buggy
ModMetaData.description:
Add more letters to help better manage Biotech events. The new letters are: [list] [*]Send a letter when someone's genes have finished regrowing. [*]Send a letter when a colonist or prisoner reaches romanceable age (16 biological age, hard-coded for now). [*]Send a letter when someone's genes extracted by using the Gene Extractor. I don't know how to include the extracted genes info in the letter (using Harmony). Helps and pointers would be greatly appreciated! [/list]
It can be safely added mid-game and should not conflict with any mods.
Options for each events are: [list] [*]Send letter. [*]Pause the game. [/list]
If you like this mod, maybe check out my other one: Permanent Injury Letter https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2592535960 Billed Deep Drill https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2593197871
It would be great to receive feedback, suggestions or pointers on how to improve.Hope these mods help!
Cheers!
Github: https://github.com/WarBuggy/RimworldMod.MoreBiotechLetters.git
